item.description:
Enneagram Basic Workshop

Learn about the 9 Enneagram types in depth, what core type you are, personal growth for each type and how to relate to all 9 types. Herb acts out the 9 types with props and hats. Lots of fun. All questions will be answered!

7:00 pm - 9:30 pm
(Traditional cost $40 - Sliding scale to $20)

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram expert, having taught the Enneagram for 20 years. He is a relationship coach and therapist, teaches the Enneagram in organizations and companies and teaches workshops on communication skills, also the Myers Briggs and spiritual development.

www.herbpearce.com for full list of workshops and events. Sign up for his weekly newsletter.
item.name: Enneagram Basic Workshop
